summary: Substantial maintenance delays persist at the Navy's shipyards. 75% of planned maintenance periods were completed late for aircraft carriers and submarines in FY 2015-2019, with an average delay of 113 days for carriers and 225 days for submarines. We identified 2 main causes for the delays: Unplanned work, identified after maintenance planning is finished Shipyard workforce performance and capacity As a result, the Navy relies...
title: Navy Shipyards: Actions Needed to Address the Main Factors Causing Maintenance Delays for Aircraft Carriers and Submarines
